label: Personal Training
description: Services and resources related to personal training, including finding a trainer, certification, and training programs.

subcategories.label: Finding a Personal Trainer
subcategories.description: Resources for finding a personal trainer in a specific location or with specific qualifications.

subcategories.label: Becoming a Personal Trainer
subcategories.description: Resources for becoming a personal trainer, including certification and training programs.

subcategories.label: Personal Training Certification
subcategories.description: Information about personal training certification, including requirements and exam preparation.

subcategories.label: Personal Training Programs
subcategories.description: Training programs for personal trainers and clients, including online and in-person options.

subcategories.label: Personal Training Resources
subcategories.description: General resources related to personal training, including articles, blogs, and forums.
